\providecommand{\tabularnewline}{\\}

\usepackage{pgf}
\usepackage{lastpage}

\let\oldmaketitle\maketitle

\renewcommand{\maketitle}{\oldmaketitle \thispagestyle{fancy}}

\makeatother

\usepackage{babel}
\begin{document}

\lhead{Alex Hagen}


\chead{QE Studying: Thermal Hydraulics Solutions}


\rhead{1/6/15}


\cfoot{\thepage\ of \pageref{LastPage}}


\title{Vector Operations \cite[p. 832-838]{Bird2007}}

\maketitle

\section{Gradient ($\nabla$)}

\begin{center}
\begin{tabular}{>{\centering}p{3cm}>{\centering}p{10cm}}
commutative & $\nabla\left(fg\right)=f\nabla g+g\nabla f$\tabularnewline
\noalign{\vskip0.2cm}
cartesian & $\nabla f=\frac{\partial f}{\partial x}\hat{x}+\frac{\partial f}{\partial y}\hat{y}+\frac{\partial f}{\partial z}\hat{z}$\tabularnewline
\noalign{\vskip0.2cm}
cylindrical & $\nabla f=\frac{\partial f}{\partial r}\hat{r}+\frac{1}{r}\frac{\partial f}{\partial\theta}\hat{\theta}+\frac{\partial f}{\partial z}\hat{z}$\tabularnewline
\noalign{\vskip0.2cm}
spherical & $\nabla f=\frac{\partial f}{\partial r}\hat{r}+\frac{1}{r}\frac{\partial f}{\partial\theta}\hat{\theta}+\frac{1}{r\sin\left(\theta\right)}\frac{\partial f}{\partial\phi}\hat{\phi}$\tabularnewline
\noalign{\vskip0.2cm}
\end{tabular}
\par\end{center}


\section{Divergence ($\nabla\cdot$)}

\begin{center}
\begin{tabular}{>{\centering}p{3cm}>{\centering}p{10cm}}
commutative & $\nabla\cdot\left(f\vec{v}\right)=f\left(\nabla\cdot\vec{v}\right)+\vec{v}\cdot\left(\nabla\cdot f\right)$\tabularnewline
\noalign{\vskip0.2cm}
cartesian & $\nabla\cdot f=\frac{\partial v_{x}}{\partial x}+\frac{\partial v_{y}}{\partial y}+\frac{\partial v_{z}}{\partial z}$\tabularnewline
\noalign{\vskip0.2cm}
cylindrical & $\nabla\cdot f=\frac{1}{r}\frac{\partial\left(rv_{r}\right)}{\partial r}+\frac{1}{r}\frac{\partial v_{\theta}}{\partial\theta}+\frac{\partial v_{z}}{\partial z}$\tabularnewline
\noalign{\vskip0.2cm}
spherical & $\nabla\cdot f=\frac{1}{r^{2}}\frac{\partial\left(r^{2}v_{r}\right)}{\partial r}+\frac{1}{r\sin\left(\theta\right)}\frac{\partial\left(\sin\left(\theta\right)v_{\theta}\right)}{\partial\theta}+\frac{1}{r\sin\left(\theta\right)}\frac{\partial v_{\phi}}{\partial\phi}$\tabularnewline
\noalign{\vskip0.2cm}
\end{tabular}
\par\end{center}


\section{Laplacian ($\nabla^{2}$)}

\begin{center}
\begin{tabular}{>{\centering}p{3cm}>{\centering}p{10cm}}
cartesian & $\nabla^{2}f=\frac{\partial^{2}f}{\partial x^{2}}+\frac{\partial^{2}f}{\partial y^{2}}+\frac{\partial^{2}f}{\partial z^{2}}$\tabularnewline
\noalign{\vskip0.2cm}
cylindrical & $\nabla^{2}f=\frac{1}{r}\frac{\partial}{\partial r}\left(r\frac{\partial f}{\partial r}\right)+\frac{1}{r^{2}}\frac{\partial^{2}f}{\partial\theta^{2}}+\frac{\partial^{2}f}{\partial z^{2}}$\tabularnewline
\noalign{\vskip0.2cm}
spherical & $\nabla^{2}f=\frac{1}{r^{2}}\frac{\partial}{\partial r}\left(r^{2}\frac{\partial f}{\partial r}\right)+\frac{1}{r^{2}\sin\left(\theta\right)}\frac{\partial}{\partial\theta}\left(\sin\left(\theta\right)\frac{\partial f}{\partial\theta}\right)+\frac{1}{r^{2}\sin^{2}\left(\theta\right)}\frac{\partial f}{\partial\phi}$\tabularnewline
\noalign{\vskip0.2cm}
\end{tabular}
\par\end{center}
